sentences.sContent: a program to raise academic standards
sentences.sCn: 旨在提高学术水平的计划

sentences.sContent: ...Many schools simply don’t prioritize academic competitions...
...Many schools don’t place academic competitions at the top of their priority list...
...university serves as the cradle of academic researchers in different areas...

...First-Generation College-Goers: Unprepared and Behind Kids who are the first in their families to brave the world of higher education come on campus with little academic know-how and are much more likely than their peers to drop out before graduation...
...he is likely to end up being left behind in terms of academic career...
...The overwhelming conclusion when you put this enormous literature together is that there is no clear academic advantage of sitting in all-female or all-male classes...
...Ripley contends that sports crowd out the academic missions of schools: America should learn from South Korea and Finland and every other country at the top level of international test scores...
...we would expect to see a negative relationship between the commitment to athletics and academic achievement...
...which sets academic standards and distributes money...
...arguing that they crowded out schools' academic missions...
